author: Stephanie Bedard-Chateauneuf
title: Entitled Millennials Demand Netflix Let You Binge Watch for Free Because of COVID-19
description:
An online petition is asking Netflix to offer free services to Americans because of the COVID-19 lockdown. Do they think Netflix is that stupid?
The post Entitled Millennials Demand Netflix Let You Binge Watch for Free Because of COVID-19 appeared first on CC…
content:
• People forced to stay in lockdown are desperately trying not to get bored.
  • A petition is asking Netflix and other streaming services to stop charging fees for two months.
  • Netflix is there to make a profit, and its service is already ve… [+3095 chars]
